title: Riot Kayle
body:
i was hoping if someone could tell me if i was eligible for the free Riot Kaye skin, there's a small gap in my match history where i was unable to play between July 12 - September 13th.

really hope i can get it :){{champion:10}}

replies.body: Per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), as long as you've played a game up to the 19 you'll be eligible.  Gifts are still being rolled out, but you can stay updated through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight until gifts are done being sent!
